about_the_game:
You are trapped in a cabin. In front of you is a rulebook and many strange game documents. Your only goal: escape from here.

  • Rulebook: There are many strange rules with comments from others next to them. Which rules should you follow? Which comments should you trust? These are questions you need to figure out.
  • Enemies: There are three strange toys and a slow-moving grandma in the cabin. Don't get caught by them!
  • Mini-games: The toys will play 8 mini-games with you, each with unique rules. How can you win the games while following the rules? Or should you find a way to cheat?
  • Party Time: Every now and then, a party will be held in the cabin. Those things will go crazy and rush at you... You are the delicious cake at the party!





You open the rulebook and find that the rules conflict with the comments next to them. What’s going on? Where are the people who left these comments? Are they friends or foes? You feel confused, time is running out, and you must find a way to leave the cabin quickly. Otherwise, the party will begin!



You find many documents about the games, and they contain many strange games: "Watch out for Mines," "Final Exam"... You suddenly realize that a diary in the cabin says you must complete these games. But looking at the rules, it's so hard! Wait, maybe there's a way to cheat?



  • Exploration: Explore the cabin in first-person and solve puzzles.
  • Multiple Endings: Besides the good and bad endings, there is also a highly difficult hidden ending.
  • Puzzle Solving: Solve puzzles using documents, diaries, and manuals.
  • Fear: The entities in the game will try to scare and harm you.
  • Time Progression: Time in the game flows automatically, so make your choices quickly.
